Package assignment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MenuItem
    An interface which provides the basic structure for a menu item.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    Runs the whole restaurant reservation system.
    Dessert
    Contains the details of a dessert in the menu, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not).
    Drink
    Contains the details of a drink in the menu, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not).
    MainCourse
    Contains the details of a main course item in the menu, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not).
    Member
    Contains the details of a person who has bought the membership of the restaurant.
    MemberFile
    Contains the list of staff of the restaurant after reading their data from the member information file
    Menu
    Contains the details of all 4 kinds of menu items, i.e.
    Order
    An order consists of the details of all the items that have been ordered, the number of items in the order, the staff who created the order, the table no of where customers were seated at, the discount which is to be given to the customer, and the total amount of the order.
    OrderFile
    Inherited base class of ReservationFile, which adds items in an order, removes an item from the order, prints the current order details, prints the order invoice, and adds the details on the text file.
    OrderItem
    Contains the details of menu item which has been ordered, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not).
    Reservation
    Represents the structure of a reservation that was made.
    ReservationFile
    Inherited base class of Reservation, which is used to add a reservation, and the details of a reservation onto the file.
    Restaurant
    Contains the details of the restaurant, i.e.
    Sales
    Generates the sales report by reading the order information stored in the text file.
    SalesReport
    Generates the sales report on a monthly basis.
    SaleStructure
    Contains the monthly details of the orders placed for a particular menu item.
    SetPackage
    Contains the details of a set package item in the menu, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not).
    Staff
    Contains the details of an employee or staff working in the restaurant, and returns the details when asked for.
    StaffFile
    Contains the list of staff of the restaurant after reading their data from the Staff information file
    Table
    A table has a fixed number of seats in the restaurant.
